## Ignore Visual Studio temp files, build results, and
## files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Build results
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/
[Ll]ogs/

# Visual Studio cache/options directory
.vs/

# Visual Studio profiler
*.psess
*.vsp
*.vspx

# Tạm / cache / database
*.db
*.db-shm
*.db-wal
*.dbmdl
*.jfm

# Rider project files
.idea/

# Visual Studio Code
.vscode/
*.code-workspace

# Backup & generated files
*.bak
*.tmp
*.swp
*.sln.ide

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
# The packages folder can be ignored because of Package Restore
**/packages/*
# except build/, which is used as an MSBuild target.
!**/packages/build/

# Test results
[Tt]est[Rr]esult*/
*.trx
*.coverage
*.coveragexml

# Microsoft Azure Web App publish settings
PublishProfiles/

# Publish output
*.pubxml
*.pubxml.user

# Docker related
**/docker-compose.override.yml
**/docker-compose.override.*.yml
**/docker-compose.debug.yml
**/docker-compose.debug.*.yml

# Node modules (nếu có frontend trong microservice)
node_modules/

# Logs
*.log

# Environment files (Secrets)
.env
.env.*

# JetBrains Rider DotCover
*.dotCover

# Others
*.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Visual Studio auto generated files (thêm để tránh bị dính như ảnh bạn gửi)
*.vsidx
*.v2
*.v3
*.v4
*.bin
*.cache
*.db-wal
*.db-shm
*.opendb
